output.sentences: Here we go off to the town renisancce festival.
This is uncle jack who makes all of the food from the festival every year.
We sat and had a wonderful dinner that evening, compliments of uncle Jack of course.
We said goodbye to all of the lovely colorful people at the festival and went home.
